entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
